ActFirearms Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the CONDITIONS OF TRANSFERRING FIREARMS AND OTHER WEAPONS REGULATIONS by repealing the requirements whereby the Chief Firearms Officer was required to approve transfers of non-restricted firearms between individuals and between businesses, and by modifying some of the verification requirements.
